Name: Big Apple Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of apple wedge or dehydrated apple slice.
Garnish with apple wedge on rim or float dehydrated apple slice .
Review: Spirits-forward, with a trio of spirits, and vermouth as befits the Martini name. Apple notes are well integrated rather than in your face.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2022 by Julie Reiner at Milady's in New York City, USA. The original recipe omits sour apple liqueur and apple juice and instead combines the vodka and gin in a Granny Smith green apple infusion.
Nutrition: One serving of Big Apple Martini contains 192 calories
